reason: AMBIGUOUS 'NEXT WEAKER PARTICLE': The phrase 'pushes into the next weaker particle clockwise' admits two contradictory readings: (A) interact with the adjacent site clockwise (nearest-neighbor TASEP), or (B) scan clockwise past all stronger-or-equal particles until finding a strictly weaker one (long-range PushTASEP). The actual t-PushTASEP uses reading (B). A reader picking reading (A) constructs a fundamentally different process.
